message.content: {"id": "2529", "title": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)", "description": "Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.", "OB": "When selecting both P1 and P2, I noticed that the Open Project menu item is available but the Close Project is not.", "EB": "The Close Project menu item should also be available when selecting both P1 and P2.", "SR": "Ensure that the Close Project menu item is always available when selecting both P1 and P2."}
